localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: final makes it easy to give & receive feedback on your video & audio files. It marks all comments with a timestamp, so you know exactly where to make changes. Your project feedback gets stored in one place & you never have to skim through lots of emails again.
blogPost.body: final makes it easy to give & receive feedback on your video & audio files. It marks all comments with a timestamp, so you know exactly where to make changes. Your project feedback gets stored in one place & you never have to skim through lots of emails again.
blogPost.title: final - Real time feedback for your video and audio files.
blogPost.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: final 让您可以轻松地对您的视频和音频文件进行反馈和接收。它用时间戳标记所有的评论，这样你就可以准确地知道在哪里进行修改。你的项目反馈会被存储在一个地方，你再也不用浏览大量的电子邮件了。
localize.tagline: 对您的视频和音频文件进行实时反馈。

localize.description: final 讓您可以輕鬆地對您的視頻和音頻文件進行反饋和接收。它用時間戳標記所有的評論，這樣你就可以準確地知道在哪裏進行修改。你的項目反饋會被存儲在一個地方，你再也不用瀏覽大量的電子郵件了。
localize.tagline: 對您的視頻和音頻文件進行實時反饋。

previous.title: BIDEN’S COVID STIMULUS INCLUDES AN $86 BILLION BAILOUT FOR STATE PENSION FUNDS THAT ARE DREADFULLY UNDERFUNDED *

localize.full_text: BIDEN的COVID STIMULUS包括86亿美元的救助，用于国家养老金基金，这些基金的资金严重不足*。
BIDEN的COVID STIMULUS包括86億美元的救助，用於國家養老金基金，這些基金的資金嚴重不足*。

next.excerpt: Jooseph is a content curation tool for course creators to share learning paths with their audience. - Create interactive learning paths from any link on the web - Accept paid subscriptions, and make money - Make announcements, keep your audience updated
next.title: Jooseph - Content curation tool for paid learning paths

localize.description: Jooseph是一个内容策划工具，供课程创建者与受众分享学习路径。- 从网络上的任何链接创建交互式学习路径--接受付费订阅，并赚钱--发布公告，让你的受众得到更新。
localize.tagline: 付费学习路径的内容策划工具

localize.description: Jooseph是一個內容策劃工具，供課程創建者與受衆分享學習路徑。- 從網絡上的任何鏈接創建交互式學習路徑--接受付費訂閱，並賺錢--發佈公告，讓你的受衆得到更新。
localize.tagline: 付費學習路徑的內容策劃工具
